Package org.pepstock.charba.client.configuration

Class LinearTickOptionsHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pepstock.charba.client.configuration.AxisContainer
      • org.pepstock.charba.client.configuration.NumericTickOptionsHandler
        • org.pepstock.charba.client.configuration.LinearTickOptionsHandler
  • final class LinearTickOptionsHandler
extends NumericTickOptionsHandler
    This object is used to provide the scriptable options of IsLinearTick ticks.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero
